markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Kobold Tunnelrunner](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1032)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Kobolds are small, reptilian humanoids who carry physical similarities to true dragons.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 0">[Kobold Tunnelrunner](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1032)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=224" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder Encounter: Heaving Kobolds](/Sources.aspx?ID=65) pg. 0</row>

**Perception** +6; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +5, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +5, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +2, [Mining Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +4, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Light Pick](/Weapons.aspx?ID=30)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +4 

</row>

**HP** 16

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
light pick +6 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [fatal d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=178)),
**Damage** 1d4+1 piercing

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**    The kobold tunnelrunner deals an extra 1d4 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-65" />
name: Kobold Tunnelrunner
